result.purpose: Defines data models and request/response structures for various functionalities in the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file defines specific data models and request/response structures related to different functionalities of the application.

models/account.go.purpose: Defines data models and request/response structures for user account management and authentication.

models/announcement.go.purpose: Defines the Announcement model and related functionalities for handling announcements in a database.

models/app.go.purpose: Defines data models for code versioning and update requests.

models/binance.go.purpose: Defines data structures for signing requests and responses with Binance.

models/blacklist.go.purpose: Defines a request structure for retrieving blacklist sites.

models/chain.go.purpose: Defines the configuration structure for a blockchain network including contracts and decentralized applications.

models/common.go.purpose: Defines data models for common structures used in the application.

models/contract.go.purpose: Defines data models and types for handling blockchain contract information.

models/default.go.purpose: Defines data models and response structures for handling API responses and pagination.

models/device.go.purpose: Defines device-related data structures and request types for managing device information.

models/external_auth.go.purpose: Defines data structures for handling external authentication requests and responses.

models/highlight.go.purpose: Defines the Highlight model and related structures for managing highlight data.

models/ip_locations.go.purpose: Defines the IPLocation model and a request structure for retrieving location data based on IP addresses.

models/moonpay.go.purpose: Defines data structures for Moonpay signing requests and responses.

models/network.go.purpose: Defines the Network model for managing blockchain network data.

models/notification.go.purpose: Defines data structures and constants for managing push notification recipients and payloads.

models/preference.go.purpose: Defines data models and filters for user preferences in an application.

models/quickaccess.go.purpose: Defines data models for Quick Access DApps and their serialization.

models/ref_code.go.purpose: Defines models and filters for managing referral codes and associated wallets.

models/releasecandidate.go.purpose: Defines request models for feature management in a device context.

models/trusted_domain.go.purpose: Defines the TrustedDomain model and related request/response structures for managing trusted domains.

models/useragent.go.purpose: Defines the AgentInfo struct and a method to check if its fields are empty.
